content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM may transfer your personal data, including any special categories of personal data as necessary, to third parties for the processing purposes set out in section 1.3 as follows:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" As part of our global structure, employee managers or certain regional or global departments may be located at other EPAM group of companies. Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your personal data in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. In order to provide adequate protection for such personal data transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and data transfers agreements including those based on the EU Standard Contractual Clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities. If deemed necessary, EPAM will implement all other additional required organizational and technical safeguards. If you need more information regarding the EPAM group of companies, please contact EPAM data privacy team at: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:privacy@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"privacy@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your personal data as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks which may be carried out by us, the customer or a third party, or for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks, always subject to applicable law. Third parties processing your personal information are listed in Annex 1, except those processors providing IT platforms and software. Any changes or modifications to this list will be notified to you on a yearly basis, if applicable. For information regarding IT platform and software providers, please contact EPAM data privacy team at: privacy@epam.com.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain acquiring or acquired entities:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the EPAM business for which you work is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM business for which you work (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal data may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new employer, potential new employer, the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located. We shall inform you in advance of the identity of any third party to whom your personal data will be communicated to the extent required by law. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With data processors:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal data to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"Data Processors\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes, such as third-party insurance and benefits providers. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal data, and to process your personal data only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal data transfers. We shall inform you in advance of the identity of any third party to whom your personal data will be communicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As far as the transfer of your data towards any third countries (other than EU/EEA members) is concerned, EPAM guarantees that in any event the processing of such data will take place in accordance with one of the methodologies allowed by the law, such as for example: (i) your consent, (ii) the adoption of Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission, (iii) the selection of transferees which subscribed to programs pertaining to the free movement of data or which operate in countries considered as safe by the European Commission. If deemed necessary, EPAM will implement all other additional required organizational and technical safeguards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
